last_episode_to_air.name: The End of the Beginning
last_episode_to_air.overview: Feeling nostalgic, Paige and Frankie agree to Roman Winwood's pitch to travel to NYC and shoot a TV series about their lives.

name: Bizaardvark
overview: The live-action comedy follows comedy duo Paige and Frankie, two quirky teens who write funny songs and create music comedy videos for their online channel. With the help of friend and aspiring agent Bernie plus Vuuugle stars Dirk and Amelia, the best friends embark on comedic adventures in their quest to take the video blogging world by storm.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Paige and Frankie have been selected to stay at Vuuugle’s prestigious beach house in Malibu, California for the entire summer, along with several other top social media influencers. The comedy duo’s housemates include fellow v-logging star Amelia, their buddy Bernie and two new rambunctious tween bloggers – Zane (of “Zane’s Unboxed”) and Rodney (of “What’s in M’ Hair”) – who run their online channels with their moms. With the friends by their side, Paige and Frankie embark on an endless summer of creativity and fun.

episodes.name: First!
episodes.overview: Frankie and Paige begin to second guess their talents as they struggle to come up with ideas for a video they feel is good enough to present during their first VidView party at Vuuugle.

episodes.name: Draw My Life
episodes.overview: Amelia gives Frankie and Paige tips to produce their “Draw My Life” video, which has to tell the story of how the two met and created their channel. Meanwhile, Bernie tries to help Dirk overcome his worse fear.

episodes.name: Frankie Has a Hater
episodes.overview: When the girls receive mean comments about their videos, Frankie begins to lose her confidence and becomes obsessed with finding who wrote them.

episodes.name: Superfan
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie feel like they’ve officially “made it” when they discover that they have their very first superfan, Belissa!

episodes.name: The Collab
episodes.overview: Frankie and Paige try to boost their subscriber level by collaborating with popular Vuuugle stars Victor of “Prank Town” and JiffPom.

episodes.name: Unboxing
episodes.overview: When Dirk leads the gang in a circle of truth exercise, Frankie learns Paige has been secretly taking MMA lessons and decides to join in on the fun.

episodes.name: Best Friends Tag
episodes.overview: When Paige and Frankie invite Amelia over for a sleepover, the DIY diva goes a bit overboard trying to make it perfect. Meanwhile, Bernie and Dirk try to cover up damage from a hapless dare.

episodes.name: The First Law of Dirk
episodes.overview: Paige convinces Dirk to stop being a daredevil; Kirk thinks his brother is broken for good; Bernie tries to find an office space for an important meeting.

episodes.name: Bernie's in Charge
episodes.overview: When Bernie temporarily takes charge of Vuuugle, Paige and Frankie think they can do whatever they want.

episodes.name: Pretty-Con
episodes.overview: The annual beauty convention Pretty-Con comes to Vuuugle and Amelia obsesses with beating out a beauty guru for the Golden Powder Puff Award. Paige and Frankie agree to help so they can meet the host and debut their music video.

episodes.name: Puff & Frankie
episodes.overview: After Paige and Frankie encourage Bernie to sign animal clients, he decides to represent two alley cats.

episodes.name: Halloweenvark
episodes.overview: The v-loggers have to make a scary Halloween video for Vuuugle's homepage, but they can't decide whose video is the scariest - Frankie and Paige's tale of the ghost of Hollander Prep, Dirk's haunting world without dares, or Amelia's zombie apocalypse.

episodes.name: Spoiler Alert: Belissa Returns
episodes.overview: When Paige and Frankie hit a writing slump and other bad things start happening to them, Paige begins to think they are cursed. Meanwhile, Amelia and Dirk are at odds when the lifestyle Diva declutters the Dare Lair.

episodes.name: Bizaardvark vs Vicki 'Hot Head' Fuego
episodes.overview: When Paige and Frankie learn Vuuglers get into feuds for publicity or subscribers, they decide to start a fake feud with 13-year-old MMA fighter Vicki "Thunder Foot" Fuego; their idea doesn't go according to plan.

episodes.name: Moosetashio: A Cautionary Tale
episodes.overview: When the girls realize that the most popular videos on the internet don’t require much thought, they decide to make a silly video of their own about a moose named “Moosetashio.”

episodes.name: Control + Alt + Escape!
episodes.overview: A rich Bizaardvark fan invites Paige and Frankie to his mansion and helps pay for their expensive video idea, however, the nice gesture takes an unexpected turn and the duo come face to face with social media star Eva Gutowski.

episodes.name: Agh, Humbug
episodes.overview: Bernie goes on social media star Rosanna Pansino's baking show to try and get 10,000 subscribers to fulfill his dream of being invited to the Vuuugle holiday party, along with his buddies, Paige, Frankie, Dirk and Amelia. Meanwhile, Dirk is on a mission to find the perfect gift for Horse Face.

episodes.name: Mom! Stop!
episodes.overview: Paige has mixed feelings when her mom hires her and Frankie to sing while they wait tables at their family restaurant. Meanwhile, Dirk gets himself trapped in his lair in an avalanche of props

episodes.name: Paige's Birthday Is Gonna Be Great
episodes.overview: Frankie goes to extreme lengths to throw Paige the best birthday party ever, including tricking social media star Lilly Singh to attend the party.

episodes.name: In Your Space!
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie, along with fellow Vuuglers Victor and Dirk, are picked to participate in a popular web series reality competition called "In Your Space!" Meanwhile, Bernie tries to impress Amelia with his suave moves.

episodes.name: First Day of School
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie take on public high school but quickly discover life at Sierra High is not what they thought it would be; Dirk, a recent Sierra grad and legend, tries to help Bernie and Amelia acclimate to their new school.

episodes.name: Chocolate Bananas
episodes.overview: An embarrassing Bizaardvark video insights a Paige and Frankie moral dilemma when the video unknowingly catches vandalism at the school.

episodes.name: The Doctor Will See You Now
episodes.overview: Frankie finally gets to spend some quality time with her dad, but she’s having a hard time balancing family time, school and making Bizaardvark videos with Paige.

episodes.name: Paige Bugs Out
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie find themselves questioning whether they should make a new video based on Paige's crush.

episodes.name: Friend Fight!
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie's first big argument turns personal, meanwhile Amelia is asked to perform a dance in front of the entire school, and chooses Bernie to be her unlikely partner.

episodes.name: Hawkward
episodes.overview: Against Frankie's advice, Paige decides to free Sierra High's mascot, Hawk the Owl, while at Vuuugle, Dirk and Bernie are pitted against Amelia and Alisha Marie by the devious machinations of Patrick.

episodes.name: Frankie and Amelia's Fun Friend Weekend
episodes.overview: When Paige and Dirk decide to go camping with Bernie and his Grandmother, Frankie and Amelia are left behind to formulate their own weekend plans.

episodes.name: Frankie's Cheating Teacher
episodes.overview: An attempt to get Frankie’s dad back into the dating scene goes horribly wrong when he snags a date with her English teacher.

episodes.name: Softball: The Musical
episodes.overview: The group is forced to put on an entire musical about softball in order to save face with Dirk.

episodes.name: Yes and No
episodes.overview: Paige proposes a bet that she can go longer saying "no" to things than Frankie can go saying "yes."

episodes.name: Science (Un)Fair
episodes.overview: To spare a girl they babysit from science-fair humiliation, Paige and Frankie take over her project -- and take it too far.

episodes.name: Promposal Problems
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie become the Promposal Masters of Sierra High until a lofty promposal ask from Bernie jeopardizes their perfect record AND their friendship.

episodes.name: Halloweenvark: Part Boo!
episodes.overview: When the power goes out at Vuuugle while trying to watch a scary movie, the gang is left with no choice but to make up their own scary Halloween stories.

episodes.name: A Killer Robot Christmas
episodes.overview: The Bizaardvark girls and their friends are enjoying the holiday party at the Vuuugle building, until an evil army of killer robots crash the festivities.

episodes.name: Clash of the Superfans
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie turn to crazy Bizaardvark Superfan Belissa to learn how to combat Principal Karen’s over the top obsession with the duo.

episodes.name: Don't Think, Just Dare
episodes.overview: Paige wants to break up with Reese but she doesn’t want to hurt his feelings, so she enlists her friends to help her.

episodes.name: Bernie Moves Out
episodes.overview: When Bernie becomes fed up with his grandmother treating him like a baby, he decides to move out and stay with Frankie.

episodes.name: The BFF (Before Frankie Friend)
episodes.overview: When Paige’s childhood best friend Izzy comes to town, Paige becomes envious of how well Frankie and Izzy hit it off and starts to feel like the third wheel.

episodes.name: Amelia's Perfectly Imperfect Volleyball Adventure
episodes.overview: After Paige convinces the volleyball coach to put Amelia on the team, the DIY Diva’s ego lands the volleyball team in a match against the state champions.

episodes.name: Paige Is Wrong
episodes.overview: When Frankie declares a girl at their school, Jade, is a bad person, Paige sets out to prove her wrong.

episodes.name: Spring Break Video Spectacular
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie kick off spring break creating a variety of fun videos with their buddies and other fan-favorite video bloggers.

episodes.name: Her, Me, and Hermie
episodes.overview: When Paige volunteers for a veterinarian channel, Frankie begins to worry she’s going to lose her best friend and Bizaardvark.

episodes.name: The Summer of Us
episodes.overview: Paige, Frankie, Bernie and Amelia learn that they have been chosen to spend the summer at the Vuuugle House.

episodes.name: Two Me's in a Pod
episodes.overview: Amelia anticipates reuniting with her younger sister, but the girl that arrives is very different.

episodes.name: House Moms
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie try to bring order to the Vuugle House.

episodes.name: No Way, Whoa!
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie learn their favorite entertainment show is taping a piece on the Vuuugle Summer House.

episodes.name: Tree's Company
episodes.overview: Amelia wants to spend more time with her little sister Willow, but quickly realizes they have nothing in common. Meanwhile, Frankie tries to convince Bernie she would be the perfect 'house villain' for his new channel.

episodes.name: Summer Schooled
episodes.overview: Frankie learns she didn't pass chemistry and will have to attend summer school.

episodes.name: Halloweenvark Part 3: Mali-Boo!
episodes.overview: When the gang forgets to buy candy for the trick-or-treaters, they each take turns telling scary Halloween stories to make the kids forget about candy.

episodes.name: Holiday Video Sketchtacular
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie, along with their fellow v-logging buddies, create a series of zany holiday-themed sketches and fun videos.

episodes.name: Who Is Horse Face Guy?
episodes.overview: When Horse Face Guy's latest dance video goes viral, Paige and Frankie try to urge him to reveal his identity to the world finally.

episodes.name: Where There's a Willow There's a Way
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie realize they can use Willow's cuteness to get their chores done.

episodes.name: House Band
episodes.overview: Hilarity and a bit of chaos ensue in the house when Bernie, Zane and Rodney form a rock band.

episodes.name: Eye of the Duckworth
episodes.overview: Paige and Willow sell homemade granola at the local farmers market. Bernie and Frankie try to return a cell phone to its angry owner.

episodes.name: Bernie's Cousin Ernie
episodes.overview: Bernie is dreading the visit of his cousin, Ernie Plotz, who apparently, is good at everything.

episodes.name: Paige's Way vs. Frankie's Way
episodes.overview: When Bernie and Zane ask Paige and Frankie to give them feedback on their magic tricks, the girls decide to put their opposing views to the test.

episodes.name: PK in da House
episodes.overview: Paige and Frankie's plans to kick Principal Karen out of Bizaardvark are derailed when Liam invites her to be a temporary chaperone for the Vuuugle Beach house.

episodes.name: Bizaardvark Changes Lives
episodes.overview: An "Ask Us Whatever" segment on the Bizaardvark channel ends up backfiring when Paige and Frankie give poor advice to a viewer.

episodes.name: A Capella Problems
episodes.overview: When Paige gets kicked out of Sierra High's a cappella group, Paige and Frankie start their own a cappella group.

episodes.name: The Stand-Up Standoff
episodes.overview: Frankie tries her hand at standup at the urging of Paige and in a strange turn of events, the best friends end up in a roast battle against one another.

episodes.name: BizRipOffs
episodes.overview: Zane and Rodney ask Paige and Frankie to come to talk to their class in hopes of impressing a couple of girls.

episodes.name: Rozes Are Red
episodes.overview: When Amelia and Willow's dad, Red, visits Los Angeles, he and Bernie's Grandma have an instant love connection that concerns Bernie and Amelia.

episodes.name: The End of the Beginning
episodes.overview: Feeling nostalgic, Paige and Frankie agree to Roman Winwood's pitch to travel to NYC and shoot a TV series about their lives.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Paige and Frankie have been selected to stay at Vuuugle’s prestigious beach house in Malibu, California for the entire summer, along with several other top social media influencers. The comedy duo’s housemates include fellow v-logging star Amelia, their buddy Bernie and two new rambunctious tween bloggers – Zane (of “Zane’s Unboxed”) and Rodney (of “What’s in M’ Hair”) – who run their online channels with their moms. With the friends by their side, Paige and Frankie embark on an endless summer of creativity and fun.
